channel.title: Children's puzzles on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Children's puzzles on Game6r

item.title: Easter Jigsaw
item.description: In this game you will find not quite an ordinary puzzle. A picture will appear on the screen in muddy colors, which must be restored by placing the colored pieces in the places intended for them. From the beginning of the game, only a part of the fragments is available, the rest will be issued strictly one at a time. To do this, click on the button labeled “Click”.

item.title: Exotic Animals Jigsaw
item.description: In this game you will find exciting puzzles dedicated to various animals. Just connect the pieces together to end up with a given picture. The finished image as a hint is displayed on the right side of the screen, which greatly simplifies your life. The toy consists of a large number of tasks-puzzles!

item.title: Pretty Princesses Jigsaw
item.description: Children’s games Jigsaw puzzles for girls will definitely appeal to all lovers of princesses. Choose from a wide range of pictures the one you like the most. Then it remains only to arrange the pieces in the correct order. To do this, grab any element and drag it to where it should be.
